aBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-S CAO-L

ant.aBody:
Orabat sanctus Thomas ad dominum
respice in me domine invocantem te respice in me domine invocantem respice nos domine invocantem te respice in me domine exspectantem te
ac revertentem ad nuptias ac revertentem a nuptiis ac reverentem ad nuptias
